snippet: The bombing by Saudi-led forces of a factory north of Sana, the capital, killed civilian workers in nearby businesses and two military guards, local officials said.
abstract: Airstrike by Saudi-led military coalition against cement factory in Yemen kills at least 15 people, including civilians.

byline.original: By SHUAIB ALMOSAWA and KAREEM FAHIM
byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa reported from Sana, and Kareem Fahim from Amman, Jordan.

lead_paragraph: The bombing by Saudi-led forces of a factory north of Sana, the capital, killed civilian workers in nearby businesses and two military guards, local officials said.

headline.main: Airstrike at Yemen Cement Factory Said to Kill at Least 15
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Yemen: An Airstrike Kills at Least 15
